price: 83. Pareille promesse nous a déjà été faite, à nous comme à nos ancêtres. Ce ne sont, en vérité, que d’anciennes légendes ! »
arabic: لَقَدۡ وُعِدۡنَا نَحۡنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا هَٰذَا مِن قَبۡلُ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: laqad wuʿid'nā naḥnu waābāunā hādhā min qablu in hādhā illā asāṭīru al-awalīna
